name: Exam Game (Michael)
description:
AIM

Use the buttons to navigate past obstacles in order to reach the portal

CONTROLS

Use your mouse  to click the on screen buttons

Features:

• Title screen with multiple difficulty levels

•  Sound effects

• Background music

• Lives System

• Bonus Lives

•  Reset Button

• Sprite Animations

• In-game UI

• Start  of level text
